author: Mariah Haas
title: Josh Brolin sorry for visiting dad James, stepmom Barbra Streisand amid coronavirus lockdown: 'Irresponsible'
description: Josh Brolin has issued an apology after recently visiting his father, James Brolin, and stepmother, Barbra Streisand, amid California's stay-at-home order due to COVID-19.
content:
